history.empty: You have no transaction history yet.

receive.maxTokensWarning: Avoid sending more than {count} tokens in a single transaction to this wallet. Limited device memory could cause your funds to become inaccessible.

addressQrCodeDialog.description: Scan this QR code to receive assets in {address}.

addressVerifyDialog.description: Ensure that the displayed address and path match exactly what appears on your device.

send.noSelectedAssetsError: Please select at least one asset to send this transaction.

validations.minNamedAsset: You need at least {min} {asset} to send this transaction.

transactionEntry.newTokenDescription: This token will be minted in this transaction.

transactionFeeConfig.minFeeError: You need to pay a minimum fee of {min} {name} to send this transaction.

transactionSign.burningDescription: The assets listed below will be lost. Only continue if you know exactly what are you doing.

transactionSignDialog.title: Transaction Review
transactionSignDialog.successDescription: Your transaction has been successfully signed and sent.

wallet.wrongPasswordErrorDescription: Please enter the correct spending password.
wallet.minSpendingPasswordLength: Spending password must be at least {min} characters long.
wallet.infoStepDescription: This information will be used to identify and protect your wallet.

alerts.demurrageDescription: UTxOs holding tokens must have sufficient ERG to cover demurrage fee, or you risk losing them. Consolidate your assets to avoid this.
alerts.fragmentationDescription: Consider optimizing your wallet for improved performance and efficiency.

index.title: Welcome to Nautilus Wallet
index.subtitle: Choose an option to get started
index.kyaAgreement: By proceeding, you agree to Nautilus' {kya}

create.recoveryPhraseDoNotMatch: The recovery phrase does not match the original one.
create.secretStepDescription: These words are the keys to your wallet. Make sure you save them in a secure location.
create.secretConfirmStepDescription: Complete the missing parts of your recovery phrase.

import.importStepTitle: Insert the Extended Public Key of your wallet.
